basics.name: Joshua Adrian Cahyono
basics.label: Machine Learning Student
basics.summary: A dedicated and passionate machine learning enthusiast with experience in reinforcement learning, robotics, and large-scale model development. Committed to impactful AI solutions and advancing research in AI safety.

work.name: NTU-Continental Lab
work.summary: Developed state-of-the-art diffusion planners for robotic motion planning in simulation and real-world environments.
highlights: Enhanced autonomous navigation systems using PyTorch and ROS.
Deployed algorithms on Jackal robot and compared three approaches (CNN, Transformer, Diffusion Planners).

work.name: A*STAR Institute for Infocomm Research (I2R)
work.summary: Developed AI-driven solutions for optimizing medical treatment using reinforcement learning.
highlights: Designed a custom offline RL environment tailored to medical datasets.
Prepared MIMIC-III datasets for efficient algorithm testing and publication.

awards.title: Silver Medal
awards.summary: Ranked 43rd among 300+ participants globally for solving algorithmic challenges.

awards.title: Silver Medal
awards.summary: Ranked 10th among 100k participants nationally for solving algorithmic challenges.
